project.name: C-C127C-GIMP-06-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C127C-GIMP-06-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Has a heap buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the heap buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the heap buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127C-GIMP-06-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: color invert an image Has a heap buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the heap buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the heap buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably not going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

compare_check.expected: Layer created, and layer mode changed.

iopair.name: C-C127C-GIMP-06-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF02-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Has a heap buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the heap buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the heap buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="$(echo QUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUGugIE= | base64 --decode)" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_CUvDCebFksGNDWQvheQv AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_THUQMxFkuj) AND NOT timeout_wzFMOXlPlM) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_THUQMxFkuj) OR timeout_wzFMOXlPlM OR controlled_exit_NPixbEhAkw)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_THUQMxFkuj) AND NOT timeout_wzFMOXlPlM) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_THUQMxFkuj) OR timeout_wzFMOXlPlM OR controlled_exit_NPixbEhAkw))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -P "value [\x80-\xFF] appears: 5555 times" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0)); then true; else false; fi;
